segments.text: Ugh, that sink is a total mess, water pouring out disgustingly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor looks filthy, spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes in that slop, how gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting soaked with dirty water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing around in this disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand in the cookie jar after touching who knows what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool's wobbling in the wet spot, nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, she might step in the puddle next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water dripping down the cabinets, ruining the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen smells like wet mop, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking cookies amid this filth, unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the peaceful garden view can't hide the indoor grime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just revolting, all that unnecessary sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR
